decks.notes: The main focus of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and quick, efficient removal spells. Cards like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge are used to quickly deal with threats on the board, while creatures like Amped Raptor and Guide of Souls put pressure on the opponent. The deck also utilizes cards like Blood Moon and Static Prison to disrupt the opponent's mana base and slow down their game plan. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and fast-paced, using a combination of creatures and spells to quickly close out games.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures and control the board with spells like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble. The key strategy is to accelerate into large threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Trinisphere. The combination of ramp and control allows the deck to dominate the late game and overwhelm opponents with powerful threats.

The main idea of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple, in order to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul, the Promised End and Breaker of Creation. The deck also includes control elements like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats while controlling the game with disruptive spells and abilities.

This deck focuses on using spells to control the opponent's board while setting up for a powerful reanimation combo. By countering threats with cards like Force of Negation and Spell Snare, and removing creatures with Fatal Push and Toxic Deluge, the deck buys time to set up the combo. Tainted Indulgence and Persist allow for graveyard manipulation and reanimating key creatures like Archon of Cruelty. The deck also includes card draw with Consider and utilizes lands like Polluted Delta and Watery Grave for mana fixing. Ultimately, the goal is to overwhelm and outvalue opponents with powerful reanimated creatures.
